sql.name: 获取未删除的组织机构
sql.content: SELECT id,id as org_id, org_code, org_name,create_date FROM t_org WHERE status IN ('N','R')

sql.name: 检查单位名是否存在
sql.content: SELECT COUNT(*) as countNum FROM t_org WHERE id != ':orgId' AND org_name = ':orgName'

sql.name: 修改单位
sql.content: UPDATE t_org SET id=':id', org_name=':orgName', org_code=':orgCode', tax_number=':taxNumber', address=':address', area_code=':areaCode', telephone=':telephone', open_bank=':openBank', account=':account', contacts=':contacts', contact_position=':contactPosition', email=':email', contact_phone=':contactPhone' WHERE id = ':orgId'

sql.name: 删除单位
sql.content: UPDATE t_org SET status='D' WHERE id = ':orgId'

sql.name: 恢复单位
sql.content: UPDATE t_org SET status='R' WHERE id = ':orgId'

sql.name: 获取未删除的单位列表
sql.content: SELECT id,org_name, org_code, tax_number, address, area_code, telephone, open_bank, account, contacts, contact_position, email, contact_phone, status, creator,create_date FROM t_org WHERE status IN ('N','R') [ AND instr(org_name,':orgName') > 0 ] ORDER BY create_date DESC

sql.name: 获取删除的单位列表
sql.content: SELECT id,org_name, org_code, tax_number, address, area_code, telephone, open_bank, account, contacts, contact_position, email, contact_phone, status, creator,create_date FROM t_org WHERE status = 'D' [ AND instr(org_name,':orgName') > 0 ] ORDER BY create_date DESC

sql.name: 根据ID获取单位
sql.content: SELECT id,org_name, org_code, tax_number, address, area_code, telephone, open_bank, account, contacts, contact_position, email, contact_phone, status, creator,create_date FROM t_org WHERE id = ':orgId'
